org.eclipse.scada.configuration.component.provider

Class SingleValueItemProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ItemProviderAdapter
      • org.eclipse.scada.configuration.component.provider.ComponentItemProvider
        • org.eclipse.scada.configuration.component.provider.DataComponentItemProvider
          • org.eclipse.scada.configuration.component.provider.SingleValueItemProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstantValueItemProvider, ExternalValueItemProvider, PersistentValueItemProvider

    public class SingleValueItemProvider
extends DataComponentItemProvider
    This is the item provider adapter for a SingleValue object.
